Features.title: Single Sign-on
Features.text: One account is all you need, a single username and password to get you into everything Government.

Features.title: Convenience
Features.text: Pay from anywhere using mobile money, Debit and Credit Cards, and online banking from local banks.

Features.title: Online Services
Features.text: Receive email and SMS notification every time your application has progressed.

Features.title: Online Services
Features.text: Fill online application forms, submit then receive your permit in PDF format from wherever you are.
